Additionally, the guide price is a guide only and should be adjusted accordingly to reflect the Dungeon Master's world.

Longsword of Life Stealing.name: Longsword of Life Stealing
Longsword of Life Stealing.description:
(Requires attunement)

When you attack a creature with this magic weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, that target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage, provided that the target isn't a construct or an undead. You gain temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

attack.condition: Must roll a 20 and the target cannot be undead.

Natural 20 Damage.name: Natural 20 Damage
Natural 20 Damage.condition: When you attack a creature and roll a 20 on the attack roll

Necklace of Adaptation.name: Necklace of Adaptation
Necklace of Adaptation.description:
Wondrous item, (requires attunement)

While wearing this necklace, you can breathe normally in any environment, and you have advantage on saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors (such as @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LkvI11Uue774QBKZ]{Cloudkill} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TwlD4PLcltv7Xh7j]{Stinking Cloud} effects, inhaled poisons, and the breath weapons of some dragons).

Light Crossbow +2.name: Light Crossbow +2
Light Crossbow +2.description:
Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Crossbow Bolt +2.name: Crossbow Bolt +2
Crossbow Bolt +2.description:
This ammunition is used for all varieties of crossbow and is typically a short metal shaft with a narrow piercing tip. It has been imbued with magic.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

Ring of Jumping.name: Ring of Jumping
Ring of Jumping.description:
(Requires attunement)

While wearing this ring, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZrTc23tToJ0JpH2h]{Jump} spell from it as a bonus action at will, but can target only yourself when you do so.

Sling Bullet +3.name: Sling Bullet +3
Sling Bullet +3.description:
A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling. It has been imbued with magic.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

Sprig of Mistletoe.name: Sprig of Mistletoe
Sprig of Mistletoe.description:
A hardy sprig of mistletoe, holly, or some other sacred leaf, picked from a tree whose roots are sunken deep into a ley line. Those who heed nature's call are able to harness this connection to call forth the incredible power of nature.

Spellcasting Focus. A druidic focus is a special item designed to channel the power of spells from the druid's spell list. A druid can use such an item as a spellcasting focus, using it in place of any material component which does not list a cost.

Staff of Frost.name: Staff of Frost
Staff of Frost.description:
(Requires attunement by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)

You have resistance to cold damage while you hold this staff.

The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]{Cone of Cold} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]{Fog Cloud} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH]{Ice Storm} (4 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.fzZnVKLmBMo2f5up]{Wall of Ice} (4 charges).

The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

Staff of Frost.name: Staff of Frost
Staff of Frost.description: You have resistance to cold damage while you hold this staff.

Woodcarver's Tools.name: 木雕工具
Woodcarver's Tools.description:
These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade in woodcarving.

Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft. Each type of artisan's tools requires a separate proficiency.

Greatsword.name: 巨剑
Greatsword.description: A mighty two-handed blade is over four feet long an almost five inches wide. This weapon requires extensive martial training but those proficient in its use are formidable warriors.

Half Plate Armor +3.name: Half Plate Armor +3
Half Plate Armor +3.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

Scarab of Protection.name: Scarab of Protection
Scarab of Protection.description:
Wondrous item, (requires attunement)

If you hold this beetle-shaped medallion in your hand for 1 round, an inscription appears on its surface revealing its magical nature. It provides two benefits while it is on your person:

  • You have advantage on saving throws against spells.
  • The scarab has 12 charges. If you fail a saving throw against a necromancy spell or a harmful effect originating from an undead creature, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and turn the failed save into a successful one. The scarab crumbles into powder and is destroyed when its last charge is expended.

utility.condition: Charges are consumed by necromancy spells or an undead caster.

Well of Many Worlds.name: 诸界之井
Well of Many Worlds.description:
奇物

这块丝绸般柔软的精致黑色布料折叠起来有手帕大小，展开时则为直径6尺的圆形。

你可以用一个动作展开诸界之井并把它放在坚实表面上，产生一扇通向另一个世界或存在位面的的双向传送门。每次诸界之井展开时，由DM决定它通向何处。你可以用一个动作抓住布料的边缘把它折叠起来，以将传送门关闭。一旦诸界之井打开过一个传送门，它在 1d8 小时内将无法再次启动。

Burglar's Pack.name: Burglar's Pack
Burglar's Pack.description: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

Giant Slayer Longsword.name: Giant Slayer Longsword
Giant Slayer Longsword.description:
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

When you hit a giant with it, the giant takes an extra 2d6 damage of the weapon's type and must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone. For the purpose of this weapon, "giant" refers to any creature with the giant type, including ettins and trolls.

Potion of Necrotic Resistance.name: Potion of Necrotic Resistance
Potion of Necrotic Resistance.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Necrotic type damage for 1 hour.

For other potions of resistance, roll on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables.RollTable.JzLOE4IxcmxjLLuz]{Potion of Resistance} table.

Lock.name: Lock
Lock.description: A key is provided with the lock. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick this lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Your DM may decide that better locks are available for higher prices.

Shield +2.name: Shield +2
Shield +2.description: While holding this shield, you have a bonus to AC of +2. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

Sun Blade.name: Sun Blade
Sun Blade.description:
(Requires attunement)

This item appears to be a longsword hilt. While grasping the hilt, you can use a bonus action to cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existence, or make the blade disappear. While the blade exists, this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with shortswords or longswords, you are proficient with the Sun Blade.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.

The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persists, you can use an action to expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet each, to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.

Frost Brand Greatsword.name: Frost Brand Greatsword
Frost Brand Greatsword.description:
(Requires attunement)

When you hit with an attack using this magic sword, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. In addition, while you hold the sword, you have resistance to fire damage.

In freezing temperatures, the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

Manual of Gainful Exercise.name: Manual of Gainful Exercise
Manual of Gainful Exercise.description:
Wondrous item

This book describes fitness exercises, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book's contents and practicing its guidelines, your Strength score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score. The manual then loses its magic, but regains it in a century.

utility.condition: The book must be completed in 6 days or less.

Pike +1.name: Pike +1
Pike +1.description:
Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Potion of Healing.name: Potion of Healing
Potion of Healing.description:
The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

You regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion.

Bagpipes.name: 风笛
Bagpipes.description:
A set of bagpipes to evoke awe, wonder, or fear in your audience.

If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

Flail +2.name: Flail +2
Flail +2.description:
Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Signal Whistle.name: Signal Whistle
Signal Whistle.description: A whistle can produce specific noise. It can be heard half a mile away.

Sling Bullet.name: 投石索弹丸
Sling Bullet.description:
A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling.

Foundry Note

It will usually be impossible to buy one sling bullet because they are worth less than a copper piece (5 bullets = 1 cp).

Trident +3.name: Trident +3
Trident +3.description:
Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Potion of Thunder Resistance.name: Potion of Thunder Resistance
Potion of Thunder Resistance.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Thunder type damage for 1 hour.

For other potions of resistance, roll on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables.RollTable.JzLOE4IxcmxjLLuz]{Potion of Resistance} table.

Elemental Gem of Air.name: Elemental Gem of Air
Elemental Gem of Air.description:
Wondrous item

This blue sapphire contains a mote of elemental energy. When you use an action to break the gem, an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.banHjKDMCegbUwYE]{Air Elemental}is summoned as if you had cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1LkZvINag7KqBmDR]{Conjure Elemental} spell, and the gem's magic is lost.

Splint Armor +2.name: Splint Armor +2
Splint Armor +2.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

Sovereign Glue.name: Sovereign Glue
Sovereign Glue.description:
Wondrous item

This viscous, milky-white substance can form a permanent adhesive bond between any two objects. It must be stored in a jar or flask that has been coated inside with oil of slipperiness. When found, a container contains 1d6 + 1 ounces.

One ounce of the glue can cover a 1-foot square surface. The glue takes 1 minute to set. Once it has done so, the bond it creates can be broken only by the application of universal solvent or oil of etherealness, or with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{Wish} spell.

Foundry Note

The 7 charges reflect the maximum amount a character can find. Please adjust as required.

Berserker Greataxe.name: Berserker Greataxe
Berserker Greataxe.description:
(Requires attunement)

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, while you are attuned to this weapon, your hit point maximum increases by 1 for each level you have attained.

Curse. This axe is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the axe, keeping it within reach at all times. You also have disadvantage on attack rolls with weapons other than this one, unless no foe is within 60 feet of you that you can see or hear.

Whenever a hostile creature damages you while the axe is in your possession, you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or go berserk. While berserk, you must use your action each round to attack the creature nearest to you with the axe. If you can make extra attacks as part of the Attack action, you use those extra attacks, moving to attack the next nearest creature after you fell your current target.

If you have multiple possible targets, you attack one at random. You are berserk until you start your turn with no creatures within 60 feet of you that you can see or hear.

Dancing Greatsword.name: Dancing Greatsword
Dancing Greatsword.description:
(Requires attunement)

You can use a bonus action to toss this magic sword into the air and speak the command word. When you do so, the sword begins to hover, flies up to 30 feet, and attacks one creature of your choice within 5 feet of it. The sword uses your attack roll and ability score modifier to damage rolls.

While the sword hovers, you can use a bonus action to cause it to fly up to 30 feet to another spot within 30 feet of you. As part of the same bonus action, you can cause the sword to attack one creature within 5 feet of it.

After the hovering sword attacks for the fourth time, it flies up to 30 feet and tries to return to your hand. If you have no hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet. If the sword has no unobstructed path to you, it moves as close to you as it can and then falls to the ground. It also ceases to hover if you grasp it or move more than 30 feet away from it.

Potion of Acid Resistance.name: Potion of Acid Resistance
Potion of Acid Resistance.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Acidic type damage for 1 hour.

For other potions of resistance, roll on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables.RollTable.JzLOE4IxcmxjLLuz]{Potion of Resistance} table.

Vicious Pike.name: Vicious Pike
Vicious Pike.description:
A sturdy blade mounted upon the end of a long metal haft. Designed as a defensive weapon with considerable reach to both fend off and menace foes.

When you roll a 20 on your attack roll with this magic weapon, your critical hit deals an extra 2d6 damage of the weapon's type.
